Armor Piercing Arrow.name: Flèche perforante
Armor Piercing Arrow.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, chaque fois que vous perforez une protection, vous la perforez de 2 au lieu de 1

Armor Piercing Grenade.name: Grenade perforante
Armor Piercing Grenade.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, chaque fois que vous perforez une protection, vous la perforez de 2 au lieu de 1

Armor Piercing Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet lourd perforant
Armor Piercing Heavy Pistol.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, chaque fois que vous perforez une protection, vous la perforez de 2 au lieu de 1

Armor Piercing Medium Pistol.name: Pistolet moyen perforant
Armor Piercing Medium Pistol.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, chaque fois que vous perforez une protection, vous la perforez de 2 au lieu de 1

Armor Piercing Rifle.name: Fusil d'assaut perforant
Armor Piercing Rifle.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, chaque fois que vous perforez une protection, vous la perforez de 2 au lieu de 1

Armor Piercing Rocket.name: Roquette perforante
Armor Piercing Rocket.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, chaque fois que vous perforez une protection, vous la perforez de 2 au lieu de 1

Armor Piercing Shotgun Slug.name: Slug de fusil à pompe perforant
Armor Piercing Shotgun Slug.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, chaque fois que vous perforez une protection, vous la perforez de 2 au lieu de 1

Armor Piercing Very Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet très lourd perforant
Armor Piercing Very Heavy Pistol.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, chaque fois que vous perforez une protection, vous la perforez de 2 au lieu de 1

Basic Shotgun Shell.name: Chevrotine standard pour fusil à pompe

Basic Shotgun Slug.name: Slug de fusil à pompe standard

Battery Pack.name: Battery Pack
Battery Pack.description: A rechargable (1 hour) battery pack, commonly used with Exotic weapons. Contains 8 shots and can be recharged.

Biotoxin Arrow.name: Flèche à biotoxine
Biotoxin Arrow.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, votre attaque n'inflige aucun dégât. Tout être de chair touché par votre attaque doit à la place effectuer un jet de Résistance à la torture/aux drogues contre SD 15. Quiconque échoue subit 3d6 points de dégâts qui s'appliquent directement à ses points de santé. L'armure de la cible n'est pas perforée.

Biotoxin Grenade.name: Grenade à biotoxine
Biotoxin Grenade.description: Quand vous utilisez ces munitions, votre attaque n'inflige aucun dégât. Tout être de chair touché par votre attaque doit à la place effectuer un jet de Résistance à la torture/aux drogues contre SD 15. Quiconque échoue subit 3d6 points de dégâts qui s'appliquent directement à ses points de santé. L'armure de la cible n'est pas perforée.

EMP Grenade.name: Grenade IEM
EMP Grenade.description: Votre attaque n'inflige aucun dégât. Quiconque est touché par votre attaque doit effectuer un jet de Cybertech contre SD 15. En cas d'échec, le MJ choisit 2 éléments de cybermateriel ou d'électronique que transporte la cible : ces appareils cessent de fonctionner pendant 1 minute. Les cybermembres désactivés de la sorte pendent, inanimés, comme des membres de chair inertes CF pg 187.

Expansive Arrow.name: Expansive Arrow
Expansive Arrow.description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Expansive Heavy Pistol.name: Expansive Heavy Pistol
Expansive Heavy Pistol.description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Expansive Medium Pistol.name: Expansive Medium Pistol
Expansive Medium Pistol.description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Expansive Rifle.name: Expansive Rifle
Expansive Rifle.description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Expansive Shotgun Slug.name: Expansive Shotgun Slug
Expansive Shotgun Slug.description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Expansive Very Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet très lourd onéreux
Expansive Very Heavy Pistol.description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Flashbang Grenade.name: Flashbang Grenade
Flashbang Grenade.description: Deals no damage. If hit roll DV15 Resist Torture/Drugs. On a fail take the Damaged Eye and Damaged Ear Critical injuries (see pg. 188) for 1 minute. No Crit damage dealt.

Incendiary Arrow.name: Incendiary Arrow
Incendiary Arrow.description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Incendiary Grenade.name: Incendiary Grenade
Incendiary Grenade.description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Incendiary Heavy Pistol.name: Incendiary Heavy Pistol
Incendiary Heavy Pistol.description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Incendiary Medium Pistol.name: Incendiary Medium Pistol
Incendiary Medium Pistol.description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Incendiary Rifle.name: Incendiary Rifle
Incendiary Rifle.description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Incendiary Shotgun Shell.name: Incendiary Shotgun Shell
Incendiary Shotgun Shell.description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Incendiary Shotgun Slug.name: Incendiary Shotgun Slug
Incendiary Shotgun Slug.description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Incendiary Very Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet très lourd incendiaire
Incendiary Very Heavy Pistol.description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Poison Arrow.name: Poison Arrow
Poison Arrow.description: No immediate damage. If meat target hit, DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On a fail 2d6 damage to HP. No Ablation.

Poison Grenade.name: Poison Grenade
Poison Grenade.description: No immediate damage. If meat target hit, DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On a fail 2d6 damage to HP. No Ablation.

Rubber Arrow.name: Rubber Arrow
Rubber Arrow.description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Rubber Heavy Pistol.name: Rubber Heavy Pistol
Rubber Heavy Pistol.description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Rubber Medium Pistol.name: Rubber Medium Pistol
Rubber Medium Pistol.description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Rubber Rifle.name: Rubber Rifle
Rubber Rifle.description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Rubber Shotgun Slug.name: Rubber Shotgun Slug
Rubber Shotgun Slug.description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Rubber Very Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet très lourd en caoutchouc
Rubber Very Heavy Pistol.description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Sleep Arrow.name: Sleep Arrow
Sleep Arrow.description: Deals no damage. If meat target hit DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs. On fail falls Prone (see pg. 169) and unconscious for 1 minute. Can be woken by damage or another person using an action to touch/shake them.

Sleep Grenade.name: Sleep Grenade
Sleep Grenade.description: Deals no damage. If meat target hit DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs. On fail falls Prone (see pg. 169) and unconscious for 1 minute. Can be woken by damage or another person using an action to touch/shake them.

Smart Arrow.name: Smart Arrow
Smart Arrow.description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Smart Heavy Pistol.name: Smart Heavy Pistol
Smart Heavy Pistol.description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Smart Medium Pistol.name: Smart Medium Pistol
Smart Medium Pistol.description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Smart Rifle.name: Smart Rifle
Smart Rifle.description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Smart Rocket.name: Smart Rocket
Smart Rocket.description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Smart Shotgun Slug.name: Smart Shotgun Slug
Smart Shotgun Slug.description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Smart Very Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet très lourd intelligente
Smart Very Heavy Pistol.description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Smoke Grenade.name: Smoke Grenade
Smoke Grenade.description: Deals no Damage. Fills a 10m/yd x 10m/yd with smoke for 1 minute. Tasks obscured by smoke have a -4 penalty.

Teargas Grenade.name: Teargas Grenade
Teargas Grenade.description: Deals no Damage. Hit targets with Meat eyes roll DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On fail suffer Damaged Eye Critical Injury (See pg. 188) for 1 minute. Does not deal critical bonus damage.
